segments.text: This is ridiculous—what is that woman thinking?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like nothing else matters, while water gushes out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflow is ruining the cabinets and soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And her foot is in the puddle—how can she not feel it?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are making it worse by messing around with the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging off it to grab cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is unstable; he's going to break something or hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just stands there encouraging him, reaching for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're disobeying rules, sneaking treats without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess waiting to explode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the peaceful view outside can't calm this frustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and stop this nonsense right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe no one is paying attention to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR
